Case Studies — Water Reporter

2013 Technology Impact Award Winner

“With a mission to stop pollution and clean the waters of the Potomac and Shenandoah Rivers through public awareness, community action, and law enforcement, Potomac Riverkeeper’s winning innovation was a mobile application that allows its users to identify and report pollution problems in real time with photos and geo-tagging. The app has already begun to revolutionize the work of conservationists, making identifying and responding to pollution problems a more effective and precise process.” 1

Pictured third from the left is our partner John Dawes receiving the award along with the Potomac and Shenandoah Riverkeeper. Read more about the involvement of our partners at the Chesapeake Commons in their blog post.

1 501cTech, November 8, 2013. “Potomac Riverkeeper and YWCA National Capital Area win 2013 Technology Impact Awards”

Come Work With Us

Viable Industries is a cause-driven digital creative studio. We’re passionate about empowering organizations with web and mobile technologies that use their data to spark public engagement and fuel smarter problem-solving.
